src:
Milojević citirao Vujoševića nakon poraza od Budućnosti
03 Nov 2019, 15:46 by Milos
Budućnost je deklasirala Megu Bemax u meču petog kola ABA lige u Beogradu.
Trener Mege Dejan Milojević istakao je da je ekipa do sada gubila od boljih timova, ali da je ova utakmica za zaborav.
– Čestitam ekipi Budućnosti na pobedi. Osim prve četvrtine, sve ostalo je bilo za zaborav i završilo se ovako kako se završilo. Ako iz svega ovoga može da se izvuče nešto pozitivno, to je da mi nemamo pravi kiks. Izgubiti od Budućnosti, Cedevita Olimpije kod kuće, Crvene zvezde i FMP-a u gostima zaista se ne mogu tumačiti kao kiksevi, jer su to objektivno bolje ekipe od nas. Međutim, način na koji igramo je problematičan i zato moramo da se trgnemo i mečeve koji će nam odlčučivati borbu za opstanak odigramo mnogo bolje. Skor od četiri poraza i jedne pobede je loš, ali dobra stvar je što smo konkurenta u toj borbi za opstanak Zadar pobedili 24 poena razlike. Idemo dalje, rekao je Milojević, a preneo klupski sajt.
Nekadašnji reprezentativac naše zemlje smatra da je lek za izlazak iz rezultatske krize naporan rad, a citirao je i legendarnog stručnjaka Duška Vujoševića.
– Cerovina i Macura su odlučno uzimali šuteve i zato su pogađali. Svaki put kad se dvoumiš to je u najvećem broju slučajeva promašaj. Kada preskačeš dobre šuteve ništa dobro se ne dešava. Budućnost je imala dobar šuterski dan, ali mi smo se predali kad su poveli više od 10 poena razlike. Jedino rešenje za nas je da nastavimo dobro da treniramo. Duško Vujošević ima jednu izreku koja kaže: „Ekipe koje treniraju jako, ne predaju se tako lako“. To će biti naš recept. Istina je da mi ne treniramo slabo, ali ono što nedostaje je veće samopuzdanje prilikom tih šuteva. Ovo nisu igrači koji nemaju šut, samo je su izgubili samopuzdanje koje ćemo treningom morati da vratimo, dodao je Dejan Milojević.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Milojevic quoted Vujošević after his defeat to Budućnost
03 Nov 2019, 15:46 by Milos
The future was declared by Mega Bemax in the fifth round of the ABA League in Belgrade.
Mega coach Dejan Milojevic pointed out that the team has been losing to better teams so far, but that this game is forgettable.
- Congratulations to the Future team on winning. Except for the first quarter, everything else was forgettable and ended as it ended. If something positive can come of all of this, it's that we don't have the right mix. Losing from the Future, Cedevita Olympia at home, Red Star and the away FMP cannot really be interpreted as kicks because they are objectively better teams than us. However, the way we play is problematic and that is why we have to scramble and play matches that will help us survive the fight for survival. The score of four defeats and one victory is bad, but the good thing is that we have won 24 points of difference in our fight for the survival of Zadar. Going further, Milojevic said, uploading the club site.
The former representative of our country thinks that the cure for the outcome of the crisis is hard work, and he also quoted the legendary expert Dusko Vujosevic.
- Cerovina and Macura took the shots firmly and that is why they struck. Every time you doubt it, in most cases it is a failure. When you skip good shots, nothing good happens. The future was a good shooter day, but we gave up when they made more than 10 points difference. The only solution for us is to continue to train well. Dusko Vujosevic has one saying that "Teams that train hard don't give up so easily." That will be our recipe. It is true that we do not train weakly, but what we lack is greater self-confidence in these shots. These are not players who do not have a shot, they just lost the confidence that we will have to regain with training, added Dejan Milojevic.
